history.question: how many hours of training are required for anti-bias (racism, discrimination, etc.) if i am a milwaukee police office?
history.answer: Milwaukee Police Department requires every member to annually complete at least four (4) hours of bias training, which includes training on anti-racism and anti-discrimination policies (Source 1). This training is essential to ensure that members are competent with department policies and principles of fair and impartial policing.
